body_html:
@bhack Thanks, will try that soon, I was using a workaround which I'm not proud of :-)
The fix in the documentation is one month old and prior to v1.3 release, the tensorflow.org website is not updated when there is a new release ? Official doc does not have the fix

body:
@bhack Thanks, will try that soon, I was using a workaround which I'm not proud of :-)
The fix in the documentation is one month old and prior to v1.3 release, the tensorflow.org website is not updated when there is a new release ? [Official doc does not have the fix](https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/datasets#applying_arbitrary_python_logic_with_tfpy_func)
